title: Cosmo
step: Garnish with fresh lime wedge or cranberries
overview: 1 Add some zest to your Sunday with a spicy Bloody Mary recipe that's sure to turn up the fun. Savory flavors come together to create the perfect crowd pleasers for football parties, Sunday brunch or just a relaxing weekend afternoon.

title: Bloody Mary
step: Shake ingredients well in a three-piece shaker filled with ice
Strain into a glass over ice
Garnish with lime, cucumber and a celery stalk
overview: 2 Add some zest to your Sunday with a spicy Bloody Mary recipe that's sure to turn up the fun. Savory flavors come together to create the perfect crowd pleasers for football parties, Sunday brunch or just a relaxing weekend afternoon.

title: Long Island Ice Tea
step: Fill a Collins glass 3/4 full with ice
Add all ingredients except for the cola into a cocktail tin
overview: 3 Add some zest to your Sunday with a spicy Bloody Mary recipe that's sure to turn up the fun. Savory flavors come together to create the perfect crowd pleasers for football parties, Sunday brunch or just a relaxing weekend afternoon.
